Header.title: Anoxsys Networks
Header.paragraph: One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious.
Header.author: Carl Jung

About.paragraph:
AnoxsysNetworks founded back in 2016 and stopped it's research 2022. We're specialized in cyber intelligence and information gathering,  we focus on reactive defence, penetration testing and regulation.
We can take your company all the way to ISO-27001, GDPR, SICS, OCISP certification less then 120 days period process.

Services.name: Risk Management & Mitigation
Services.text: Learn an Active Defence approach by which your data and organization can coexist in a secured environment system.

Services.name: OCI & Threat Elimination
Services.text: Offensive Cyber Intelligence & Action opens a new vector of threat actors attribution identification, exploitation, elimination and purification.

Services.name: Disaster & Recovery
Services.text: Knowing how to Recover and Handle a Data Disaster in order to survive after a Cyber Attack, You will learn to recover by set a new scale on security of our organization and data.

Services.name: Operations & Projects
Services.text:
AnoxsysNetworks believes in running operative SELF system during operation integrating with the projectors environment and resources for better security.
Running in-house projects for security enhancement reasons

Services.name: Penetration Testing & Regulations
Services.text: Get your Company the assurance of Security and Privacy by Using a MangerToolKit (MTK) which will allow you to securely transmit data. Test your company Security and Pentest until confirmed secure.

Services.name: Research & Development
Services.text: Run a Program of Researchers and Engineers towards a tailor made Cyber Security Solution just for you.
